name: liquid-liberty-subquery
description: Subgraph for fetching OHLCV data for TradingView price charts

scripts.build: echo '‚ùå ERROR: Use specific build commands to prevent environment mistakes!' && echo 'Use: npm run build:sepolia, npm run build:pulse, or npm run build:local' && exit 1
scripts.build:sepolia: echo 'üîç Building for SEPOLIA network...' && npm run clean && cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=sepolia BUILD_NETWORK=sepolia node scripts/generate-constants.js && cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=sepolia BUILD_NETWORK=sepolia npm run codegen && cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=sepolia BUILD_NETWORK=sepolia subql build
scripts.build:pulse: echo 'üîç Building for PULSE network...' && npm run clean && cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=pulse BUILD_NETWORK=pulse node scripts/generate-constants.js && cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=pulse BUILD_NETWORK=pulse npm run codegen && cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=pulse BUILD_NETWORK=pulse subql build
scripts.build:local: echo 'üîç Building for LOCAL network...' && npm run clean && cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=local BUILD_NETWORK=local node scripts/generate-constants.js && cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=local BUILD_NETWORK=local npm run codegen && cross-env VITE_DEPLOY_ENV=local BUILD_NETWORK=local subql build
scripts.build:multichain: echo '‚ö†Ô∏è Multichain builds not supported in SubQuery SDK - build each network separately'
scripts.dev:docker: npm run build && docker-compose pull && docker-compose up --remove-orphans
scripts.build:develop: cross-env NODE_ENV=develop npm run codegen && subql build
